Sidebar {.sidebar}
----------------------------------------------

``` {r}
#Inputs
checkboxGroupButtons(inputId = "Cereal_brand",
                   label = h4("Cereal Brands"),
                   choices = c("Wheaties", "Cinnamon Toast Crunch", "Kix"),
                   selected = c("Wheaties", "Cinnamon Toast Crunch", "Kix"),
                   direction = "vertical")

sliderInput(inputId = "ci",
            label = h4("Select Confidence Interval"),
            min = 0.80,
            max = 0.95,
            value = 0.95,
            step = 0.05,
            pre = "%")
```

```{r}
# Reset Button
actionButton(inputId = "reset",
             label = "Reset",
             icon = icon("sync"))

observeEvent(eventExpr = input$reset, handlerExpr = {
  
  updateCheckboxGroupButtons(session = session,
                           inputId = "Cereal_brand",
                           selected = c("Wheaties", "Cinnamon Toast Crunch", "Kix"))
  
  updateSliderInput(session = session,
                    inputId = "ci",
                    value = .95)
})
```

----------------------------------------------

```{r}
# Reactive Filter
dataset <- reactive({
  sales_sample_tbl %>%
    filter(description %in% input$Cereal_brand)
})

```

### Section - Reactive Output

```{r}
# renderTable(sales_sample_tbl_filtered())
plotlyOutput("scatter_plot")

output$scatter_plot <- renderPlotly({
  data = dataset()
  plot_scatter(data)
})
```
